markdown: Antique Opera Glasses These beautiful, multi-shaded mother-of-pearl opera glasses are genuine turn-of-the-century French antiques. Each is one-of-a-kind, and comes with a Met Costume Opera Glass Case, made from costume swatches from Met productions of Aida, Lucia, Trovatore, Lohengrin and Boris Godunov. $250(2.00)#G70 The Met Mirror The magnificent proscenium of the Old Metropolitan Opera House is lovingly recreated in this finely crafted, distinctive piece. Neal Martz's design is hand cast in hydrastone, with a beautiful handcrafted gold patina. 11" high, 10" wide and 1 1/2" deep, the Met Mirror comes ready for hanging. $45(2.25)#G41 <::A photograph showing two pairs of opera glasses or binoculars. The pair on the left is lying on a patterned fabric, possibly lace or embroidered cloth, and is made of dark material with silver or chrome accents. The pair on the right is standing upright, also made of dark material with silver or chrome accents, and reflects the surface it is on. The image has a somewhat inverted or negative-like appearance.: figure::> Source: https://www.industrydocuments.ucsf.edu/docs/hjnp0227 13

chunks.markdown: Antique Opera Glasses These beautiful, multi-shaded mother-of-pearl opera glasses are genuine turn-of-the-century French antiques. Each is one-of-a-kind, and comes with a Met Costume Opera Glass Case, made from costume swatches from Met productions of Aida, Lucia, Trovatore, Lohengrin and Boris Godunov. $250(2.00)#G70

The Met Mirror The magnificent proscenium of the Old Metropolitan Opera House is lovingly recreated in this finely crafted, distinctive piece. Neal Martz's design is hand cast in hydrastone, with a beautiful handcrafted gold patina. 11" high, 10" wide and 1 1/2" deep, the Met Mirror comes ready for hanging. $45(2.25)#G41

<::A photograph showing two pairs of opera glasses or binoculars. The pair on the left is lying on a patterned fabric, possibly lace or embroidered cloth, and is made of dark material with silver or chrome accents. The pair on the right is standing upright, also made of dark material with silver or chrome accents, and reflects the surface it is on. The image has a somewhat inverted or negative-like appearance.: figure::> Source: https://www.industrydocuments.ucsf.edu/docs/hjnp0227
